remarks: The category of categories is a category, see remark 3.48 in [Adamek] p. 40.  (Clearly it cannot be an element of itself, hence it is "large" with respect to ` U ` .)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
catccat.c $e |- C = ( CatCat ` U ) $.
catccat $p |- ( U e. V -> C e. Cat ) $.
